title: Pulled pork in Chinese spices
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1 teaspoon dark soy sauce', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '3 garlic cloves, chopped', '750g boneless pork shoulder with skin', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '100g Chinese spice mix (see note) or 3 tablespoon five spice powder', '1 large onion, cut into chunks', '1 carrot, cut into chunks', '1 large Bramley apple, cut into chunks', '150ml water', '1/2 chicken stock cube']
